channel.title: onboarding on Getting Started
channel.description: Recent content in onboarding on Getting Started

item.author: alejandro.moralesmartinez@ucsf.edu (Alejandro Morales Martinez)
item.description: Onboarding Checklist 1. Get a Slack account: Email Ana Maria Deluca a brief description of who you are and which group you belong to 2. Get two-factor authentication 3. Get Pulse secure VPN access 4. Request UCSF GitHub access (requires UCSF login) 5. Request Radiology GitLab access (requires UCSF login) - Choose **Extend** under the **Request Type** menu.
